unnormalised: Urban planning in India, as exemplified by projects like the Delhi Metro, faces unique challenges. Land acquisition, like in the Film "Gangaajal", is a constant hurdle. We need more sustainable practices advocated by institutions like NIUA (National Institute of Urban Affairs). Smart city initiatives must address the needs of all citizens, not just a select few. Implementation and citizen participation are key. It will take time for plans to come to fruition.
